    • Class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Enemy extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      2180894655636700671L

      • Serialized Fields

        • row

          int row
          the coordinates of the enemy object within the grid. These coordinates are intended to be used for movement along the grid, as well as to assist the enemy in looking for the spy.

        • col

          int col
          the coordinates of the enemy object within the grid. These coordinates are intended to be used for movement along the grid, as well as to assist the enemy in looking for the spy.

        • alive

          boolean alive
          boolean value that determines whether the enemy is alive or dead. If alive, then the enemy will still be displayed onto the grid. If not, the enemy object is no longer used in the grid.

        • hidden

          boolean hidden
          variable that is used to determine whether the enemy object is hidden from sight of the player.

        • symbol

          java.lang.String symbol
          Symbol used to represent the enemy within the grid. This is only seen if the enemy is visible to the player or the debug method is active.

    • Class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Spy extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -7248216978623767313L

      • Serialized Fields

        • row

          int row
          The coordinates used to determine the location of the spy.

        • col

          int col
          The coordinates used to determine the location of the spy.

        • lives

          int lives
          the lives that turns that the player will be using if they reach a powerup or an enemy. Turns will detemine how many turns left for for invincibility to wear off, if the player had activated that powerup.

        • turns

          int turns
          the lives that turns that the player will be using if they reach a powerup or an enemy. Turns will detemine how many turns left for for invincibility to wear off, if the player had activated that powerup.

        • alive

          boolean alive
          returns the boolean alive, to make sure that the player is still alive in the game.

        • impenetrable

          boolean impenetrable
          boolean to make sure that if the player activates the invincibility power up, then no enemy can stab the player for that certain amount of turns.

        • bullets

          int bullets
          gives the player a bullet to use whenever they so choose to use it. This will allow the player to kill an enemy, or enemies in a certain direction.

        • symbol

          java.lang.String symbol
          the symbol used to represent the player in the grid display.

        • pic

          javax.swing.JLabel pic
